Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Pashertaiht with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; column of Hieroglyphic text down the leg section; back-pillar and a plinth; the foot has become separated.
Condition: poor - repaired from three fragments; foot has re-separated
